title: The Quinn rework is making me a bit nervous
body:
Given how recent reworks tend to overtune champions or remove their identities entirely, I really don't know which would be worse.

Especially since Quinn has so much potential to be strong. She's already really good at kiting melee champions, especially ones reliant on auto-attacks to succeed, and she's self-sufficient enough to thrive in solo-lanes better than any adc in the game, removing all her weaknesses would break her. And then she'd become permaban and everyone would be crying to nerf her into oblivion and every Quinn player would receive the whole "you're only playing her because she's OP!" shit no matter how long we've been playing the champion...

I'm hoping it'll be fine, and I'm sure I'll like it regardless because it's Quinn, I love Quinn, but man, a bit of the fear is still there.
